statements: SELECT * FROM Journals;
SELECT journal_title, author_name, submission_date FROM Journals WHERE review_status='Pending';
SELECT journal_id, journal_title FROM Journals WHERE author_name='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Journals ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT journal_title, COUNT(*) AS total_submissions FROM Journals GROUP BY journal_title;
SELECT * FROM Journals WHERE review_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY submission_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT journal_title, author_name FROM Journals WHERE submission_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY submission_date ASC
SELECT journal_id, author_name FROM Journals WHERE author_name LIKE 'John%' AND review_status = 'Approved'
SELECT * FROM Journals WHERE review_status IN ('Accepted', 'Rejected') ORDER BY journal_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(journal_id) AS total_journals, review_status FROM Journals GROUP BY review_status HAVING COUNT(journal_id) > 1
SELECT * FROM Journals;
SELECT id, title, editor FROM Journals WHERE status='submitted';
SELECT * FROM PeerReview WHERE review_date='2022-01-15';
SELECT journal_id, reviewer_name, review_date FROM PeerReview WHERE status='completed';
SELECT title, editor FROM Journals ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Journals WHERE submission_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, editor FROM Journals ORDER BY editor ASC;
SELECT * FROM PeerReview WHERE status = 'approved' ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT title, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM Journals JOIN PeerReview ON Journals.id = PeerReview.journal_id GROUP BY title HAVING total_reviews > 3;

SELECT Journals.title, PeerReview.reviewer_name, PeerReview.comments FROM Journals JOIN PeerReview ON Journals.id = PeerReview.journal_id WHERE PeerReview.comments IS NOT NULL AND PeerReview.status LIKE 'pending%';
SELECT * FROM Journals;
SELECT journal_name, submission_date, review_status FROM Journals;
SELECT reviewer_name, expertise_area FROM Reviewers;
SELECT review_id, overall_rating, comments FROM Reviews;
SELECT journal_name, submission_date, reviewer_name FROM Journals JOIN Reviewers ON Journals.reviewer_id = Reviewers.reviewer_id;
SELECT * FROM Journals
SELECT journal_name, submission_date FROM Journals WHERE review_status = 'completed'
SELECT reviewer_name, expertise_area FROM Reviewers ORDER BY reviewer_name DESC
SELECT journal_name, review_status FROM Journals WHERE review_status = 'in_progress' ORDER BY journal_name ASC
SELECT review_date, overall_rating FROM Reviews WHERE overall_rating > 3 ORDER BY review_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Journals;
SELECT journal_name, peer_review_status FROM Journals WHERE sql_database_used = TRUE;
SELECT author_name, paper_title FROM Authors JOIN Papers ON Authors.author_id = Papers.author_id;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_status FROM Reviewers ORDER BY reviewer_id DESC;
SELECT journal_name, paper_title, author_name FROM Journals JOIN Papers ON Journals.journal_id = Papers.journal_id JOIN Authors ON Papers.author_id = Authors.author_id;
SELECT * FROM Journals WHERE peer_review_status = 'Pending';
SELECT author_name, journal_name FROM Authors INNER JOIN Journals ON Authors.journal_id = Journals.journal_id;
SELECT reviewer_name, paper_title, review_status FROM Reviewers INNER JOIN Papers ON Reviewers.paper_id = Papers.paper_id;
SELECT journal_name, COUNT(*) AS num_papers FROM Journals INNER JOIN Papers ON Journals.journal_id = Papers.journal_id GROUP BY journal_name;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) AS num_papers_published FROM Authors INNER JOIN Papers ON Authors.author_id = Papers.author_id GROUP BY author_name ORDER BY num_papers_published DESC;
SELECT * FROM Journals ORDER BY journal_id DESC;
SELECT article_title, submission_date FROM Articles WHERE journal_id = 1;
SELECT reviewer_name, expertise_area FROM Reviewers WHERE expertise_area = 'Science';
SELECT article_id, article_title, journal_id FROM Articles WHERE submission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT review_id, review_date FROM Reviews ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Journals JOIN Articles ON Journals.journal_id = Articles.journal_id WHERE Journals.editor_id = 1;
SELECT reviewer_name, expertise_area FROM Reviewers WHERE expertise_area = 'Machine Learning' ORDER BY reviewer_name DESC;
SELECT article_title, review_date FROM Articles JOIN Reviews ON Articles.article_id = Reviews.article_id ORDER BY review_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT journal_name, COUNT(article_id) AS total_articles FROM Journals JOIN Articles ON Journals.journal_id = Articles.journal_id GROUP BY journal_name;

SELECT reviewer_name, status FROM Reviewers JOIN Reviews ON Reviewers.reviewer_id = Reviews.reviewer_id JOIN Review_Status ON Reviews.review_id = Review_Status.review_id WHERE Review_Status.status = 'Accepted';
